title: Can't access my club?
body: So i made a club shortly after it's conception named Rhetorical.  Pretty much just me and my irl friends.  Anyways, a while back there was a patch ( i cant remember which one) and i was no longer able to have access to it.  It does not appear in my options tab or anything.  I inquired to my friends and they are all still in it and also it says that i am still the group leader.  Could someone pls help me?  Id like to be able to talk to my friends wihout having to start a new club. Or at least i'd like to be able to use the same name if i have to make a new club.

replies.body: I also cannot access the club I am the leader to. It's called Maverick Offensive, club tag xMOx. D:

I have the same issue. I'm the also the group leader and the club says that I'm the leader but I'm not in the club. 
tag; Smaesher
club; GDCLB

Edit: I am now able to access my club. Thanks!
There might have been a syncing issue between your account and club.  I've tried to refresh things a bit, so it should be okay now.  Let me know!
Yeah, I'm in a similar boat, is there a fix?
What's your club name and tag?  I'll see if I can bump it.
**_Ahri's Wish_**, no tag since only clubs with enough members get that and I've lost invite rights (by not having acces).
Booped!  Relog when you get a chance, and let me know if everything's okay now.
You're golden thanks for the help
Back in business. Thank you. Happy Easter.
